humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the 'left breast mastectomy -. Invasive lobular carcinoma (7 CM.)', indicating that the size of the largest tumor is 7 cm. According to the rules provided, T3 tumors are more than 5 cm. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T3.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for cancer is based on the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the left breast mastectomy specimen revealed an invasive lobular carcinoma that measured 7 cm in greatest dimension. Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T3, as the tumor size is greater than 5 cm but not more than 10 cm.
